amendment.description: To provide for data-mining reports to Congress.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2065 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 32. Record Vote Number: 435.
Motion to table amendment SA 2065 made in Senate.
Amendment SA 2065 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13885-13886, S13890-13891; text: CR S13885) To provide for data-mining reports to Congress.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2065 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 32. Record Vote Number: 435.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2065 proposed by Senator Feingold.
